name: HierarchicalShapeStyle
desc: A shape style that maps to one of the numbered content styles.

items.name: static let primary: HierarchicalShapeStyle
items.desc: A shape style that maps to the first level of the current content style.

items.name: static let secondary: HierarchicalShapeStyle
items.desc: A shape style that maps to the second level of the current content style.

items.name: static let tertiary: HierarchicalShapeStyle
items.desc: A shape style that maps to the third level of the current content style.

items.name: static let quaternary: HierarchicalShapeStyle
items.desc: A shape style that maps to the fourth level of the current content style.
